text: Apani manusake daâ€™oyata [1] dina apanara rabera pathe hikamata [2] o sadupadesa [3] dbara ebam tadera sathe tarka karabena uttama panthaya [4]. Niscaya apanara raba, tamra patha chere ke bipathagami hayeche, se sambandhe tini besi janena ebam kara satpathe ache ta'o tini bhalabhabe'i janena
